document_title: Abdominal bloating: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content:
Some easily noticeable symptoms of bloating include:
Feeling of tightness, pain, discomfort in the abdomen; Abdomen is more swollen than usual; Stomach makes unusual noises; Fart more than usual.
